name: Optimus Prime
description: Optimus Prime is the brave and noble leader of the Autobots. He transforms into a red and blue semi-truck and wields a powerful energy axe.
details: This Optimus Prime toy is highly detailed and comes with various articulation points. It includes a removable Matrix of Leadership and interchangeable hands.

name: Bumblebee
description: Bumblebee is a small but courageous Autobot. He transforms into a yellow Chevrolet Camaro and is known for his loyalty to his friends.
details: This Bumblebee toy features a movie-inspired design and comes with a blaster accessory. It has a quick and easy transformation mechanism for young fans.

name: Megatron
description: Megatron is the ruthless leader of the Decepticons. He transforms into a silver and purple Walther P38 pistol and is Optimus Prime's arch-enemy.
details: This Megatron toy features a sleek design and includes a fusion cannon accessory. It has multiple points of articulation for dynamic posing.
